Blog.post: urlLink still very sleepy, huh...? urlLink
ah... i just woke up at 11.30am, and people will wondering that why I alwake up so late and don't need to go for work. Actually I work at 3pm.... till 2am. So I will be very tried everynight.

urlLink hmm... just finished shower after works... damn tried now and listening dido's songs to relax myself... this is one of my favorite album that I have... :) it was a busy day when i was working because one of the waiter took sick leave... damn... made me so tried... urlLink

urlLink ah... just finished my lunch and get ready to work soon in my cafe... oh Ya!!! Forgt to tell you all that my cafe's name... it called CUPAK CAFE. It's nice and comfortable.... everyday will be very crowded and music around for all day.... you want hip hop? I have! you want R&B? I have too! When EPL live in Astro, I will turn on to my customers... when Akademi Fantasia live in Astro, I will play too... it will be full house for that night everyweek.... not believe it, come and see... it's in Tanjong Malim, Perak.... urlLink
urlLink this is the cafe... nice or not?? urlLink
urlLink My working place in Tanjung Malim, Perak... cupak cafe... urlLink

Shittt........ this is my first blog. But I wrote it twice because I didn't save it... damn.... I really a dumb in this thing.... anyway, I really don't what I want to write as as I lazy to write the same thing in twice.... so I think I will write it more faster now... It's interseting to write it here and read my diary at here as well... ok... I'm still sleepy now and goin to sleep for a while as I start working at 3pm... :P bye..bloggers!
urlLink Good morning, when I was checking my mail, my friend sent me this time table... so what do you guys think? urlLink

urlLink haha, I'm so happy coz I just finished work on Friday so I can come to my hometown. So first week in HDPM was fantastic... I met a lot of friends during the induction week and learned a lot... but a bit tried always coz I need to wake up at 6++am!!! Anyway, it was a good exprience for me coz I learned a lot.... so those who applying for HDPM... good luck and all the best!!! Do this pig cute???? hahaha... ciao! urlLink
